txt.en: Meet with the divided leaders of Fushaum Bal.
Defeat the leaders of Fushaim Bal.
The camp of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.

'You are a cunning one. That much is true. I have no quarrel with you. In fact, I admire what you have done here. You helped resolve our matters. Though your means of doing so evaded even me until just now.

'Leave Khirgi to me. I will push his corpse into the flames below us. Only a fitting burial for such a foul man.

'If you leave me be, I shall honour you in return and vacate Mordor as soon as my men and I are able. We do not wish to stay here any longer. It only brings us thoughts of crushed hopes and riches that never were.'
Meet with the divided leaders of Fushaum Bal
<rgb=#FF0000>Beckon</rgb> the leaders of Fushaum Bal to come forward
Defeat the leaders of Fushaum Bal
Meet with the divided leaders of Fushaum Bal
Beckon the leaders of Fushaum Bal to come forward.
